_sText:
This is a map I have worked on on and off for about over a year now, and I am glad to say that it's finally ready for release. Comfort was originally designed to look like Super Hot and/or Mirrors Edge. This map has taught me a lot about mapping, although keeping motivated to finish it was a struggle. I'd like to thank everyone that helped me out in the creation of this map, this map would be terrible without you guys.

Average No Fail Run: 3 Minutes and 30 Seconds
Difficulty: Mediumish
